fields.name: transactionId
fields.doc: Transaction Id generated by the core platform for the bid request

fields.name: networkId
fields.doc: The exchange partner's Workbench publisherId, e.g. 14000 = Doubleclick AdX

fields.name: countryCode
fields.doc: The two character Country Code based on the user's IP

fields.name: siteDomain
fields.doc: The unmodified OpenRTB site.domain value (or the exchange's equivalent)

fields.name: pageUrl
fields.doc: The unmodified OpenRTB site.page url value (or the exchange's equivalent)

fields.name: referrerUrl
fields.doc: The unmodified OpenRTB site.ref url value (or the exchange's equivalent)

fields.name: descriptionUrl
fields.doc: The unmodified Doubleclick AdX video.description_url value

fields.name: isBlacklist
fields.doc: True if the request was blocked due to url on global blocklist, CONTENT_BLOCKED: operation=20, reason=25.

fields.name: isFraud
fields.doc: True if the request was blocked due to IP address on blacklist, USER_IP_BLOCKED: operation=20, reason=27.

fields.name: isBid
fields.doc: True or False if its a bid or noBid respectively.

fields.name: ind_id
fields.doc: DTM_ID to DTM_IND_ID, or DEVICE_ID to DTM_IND_ID
